long: Meaning: to "turn"; by implication, to "face", i.e. "appear", "look", etc.  Usage: appear, at (even-) tide, behold, cast out, come on, × corner, dawning, empty, go away, lie, look, mark, pass away, prepare, regard, (have) respect (to), (re-) turn (aside, away, back, face, self), × right (early).  Source: a primitive root;
